QuestData.Title: Golgoss
QuestData.Description: The leader of the yaungol mist-shaman is named Jahesh. He is known for his strength.$b$bOne of my kind is also known for his strength. His name is Golgoss.$b$bGolgoss sleeps within the mists of the Upper Sumprushes. Help me to summon him, and he will join me in avenging our people.
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon Golgoss by planting the Mist-Shaman's Torches into the Peat Clump in the Upper Sumprushes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Golgoss is no coward. He will relish the opportunity for revenge.
QuestData.RewardText: Golgoss does not speak your language, other than a few words. I suppose I am unique in this regard.$b$bHe thanks you for summoning him.
